snippet.title: Is The Fear Of Future Regret A Valid Motivator For Having Children
snippet.description: As the debate rages about the merits of the childfree life is the fear of future regret a valid motivator for popping out babies. Regret made a cameo in a Time magazine cover story about the rise in childfree couples. Many women and men struggling over the decision—have kids or don’t have kids?—wonder [...] read »

snippet.title: The Embarrassing Failure Of Our Politics-Of-Religion Industry
snippet.description: Over at BuzzFeed, Andrew Kaczynski has done the world a favor by pointing out that Reza Aslan, a person who's good at staying dignified in an abusively dumb interview, turned right around and did unto others on Twitter what was done to him -- and more -- sometimes toward trolls, [...] read »

snippet.title: Layover Guide: Chicago O'Hare
snippet.description: If you've got to be stuck somewhere, Chicago ain't a half-bad place. O'Hare Airport has easy access to shopping, a nice gym and one of America's great downtowns. read »

snippet.title: Getting Out Of The Heat: 10 Ways For Leaders To Deal With An Angry Public
snippet.description: Yes, we’re having a heat wave. But beyond 97 degree temperatures, there is another kind of heat that some leaders around the world are facing – an increasingly angry public. The true wisdom of corporations, organizations or individuals is to know when to be quiet and bear or ignore it, when to fight back, and when to change. Here are 10 new tips [...] read »

snippet.title: WWE Hall Of Fame Diva Trish Stratus Talks WrestleMania, Video Games And AJ Lee
snippet.description: Patricia Anne Stratigias is better known to millions of professional wrestling fans as WWE Diva Trish Stratus. On April 6 at Madison Square Garden, Stephanie McMahon will induct Stratus into the WWE Hall of Fame. The seven-time Women’s Champion was a pioneer for female wrestling and one of the icons [...] read »
